Looks like zero from Borderlands 2....but in this case i guess you can call her 5
I don't like either of the project fiora concepts shown, because neither of them have her wielding a rapier. She doesn't need a katana or dual blades, that's taking away her identity.

> [{quoted}](name=CastawayTomHanks,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=a0zKmicN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-06-17T15:48:13.509+0000)
>
> I don't like either of the project fiora concepts shown, because neither of them have her wielding a rapier. She doesn't need a katana or dual blades, that's taking away her identity.

She has a second blade in her standard skin... her fighting style is based on Florentine fencing in which the fencer uses a Rapier and a Stilletto
I really don't like retyping what I just said a second ago, look down.

Castaway.... she is dual wielding. Saying that her stilletto isn't an actual sword and so she isn't dual wielding is like saying gangplank isn't dual wielding because he isn't using a second sword. Yes she uses it primarily to block, i use my pistol to block at sca events i can't stab anyone with it, it doesn't have a point but i'm still dual wielding.
Yeah, but in her case it is a primary and secondary. The fanart is showing an actual duelwielder as in someone who uses both swords equally at all times, it is different.

> [{quoted}](name=CastawayTomHanks,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=a0zKmicN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-06-17T15:48:13.509+0000)
>
> I don't like either of the project fiora concepts shown, because neither of them have her wielding a rapier. She doesn't need a katana or dual blades, that's taking away her identity.

But she always has two blades.

> [{quoted}](name=Da Dwagonswayer,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=a0zKmicN,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-06-17T18:31:18.413+0000)
>
> But she always has two blades.

The second is a parrying dagger, only used to counter. It isn't an actual sword, nor is she truly duel wielding. The emphasis is on the rapier which is what she primarily uses.

not sure what the problem is. 

in her Classic, Royal Guard and Nightraven splashes she is holding both. In the Royal Guard splash, she is holding the blades in the same way as the Project Fiora proposed art - and one is obviously a blade and the other is a dagger.

SO MUCH METAL GEAR.

IT MAKES ME SO HAPPY
I'll buy Project Fiora, sure... _after_ they deliver her rework.

I believe this skin could work. There could probably be a couple of tweaks, of course, but that's where everything starts. I don't want to dive into any specific details, because surely I would be crucified for my suggestions, seeing earlier posts. But the only thing I'll say is that the blades should be altered. It could work to keep it techno to keep the "project" theme, but it needs to fit Fiora's style. That's all.
I want it!
You're very talented!
